Name: Ricecakers
About the game: Ricecakers is an easy and funny fighting game. Players control their ricecaker monsters to fight with each other in the different scenes. Control the ricecaker to attack the robots or friends by brandishing the hands or the weapons. Player will be assigned a random silly ricecaker monster as the puppet. Picking up the weapon can let the ricecaker more powerful. Brandishing the hands or the weapons to attack the others and avoid the traps and the dangers. And the facelook of the ricecakers show their health status. Ricecakers support the single player mode to let players can fight with robots for fun. And there are also other modes to let players can play with their friends. Ricecakers is an independent game. It is my personal works.
